name: Ring Of The Ancients
description:
VERSION 1.0.0 

This was made in part of the University of Utah's November 2021 Game Jam hosted by the GameCraft club. The theme was "Tradition".

The game has 3 levels. More to come! Enjoy!

Controls:

A key - Move Left

D key - Move Right

SPACE key - Jump

MOUSE LEFT CLICK - throw ring in direction of mouse cursor (keep left click held to let the ring stay in place)

Credits:

Emily Ballin - Art

Emile Goulard - Engineering

Risky Santucci - Art & Design

Kaiden Sibbett - Engineering

Anderson - Design
